response.overview: In Role Play, Tim and Lucy, a couple struggling to revive their relationship, experiment with role-playing. After a failed attempt at intimacy, things take a bizarre turn when a creepy man named Mick unexpectedly appears in their home. Lucy invents a story, claiming Mick is there for a threesome, and Tim surprisingly agrees. As the evening spirals into chaos, hidden desires emerge, leading to dark, violent twists. What begins as an awkward role-play escalates into a disturbing power dynamic, leaving the lines between fantasy and reality blurred in this dark comedy with shocking surprises.
response.title: Role Play
